remarks.format: ## Remarks 受保護的成員供只會在內部使用.NET Framework XML 序列化基礎結構內的衍生類別所使用。The protected members of are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure. 在 XML 文件還原序列化為.NET Framework 物件時，.NET Framework XML 序列化基礎結構會動態建立實作的修復方法的執行個體委派，並建立的執行個體類別若要修復方法和其輸入的資料儲存。While deserializing XML documents into .NET Framework objects, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically creates instances of fix-up methods that implement the delegate and creates instances of the class to store the fix-up methods and their input data. 基礎結構並因此其資料類型對應至.NET Framework 的 SOAP 編碼的陣列的參考型別。The infrastructure does so for SOAP-encoded arrays whose data types map to .NET Framework reference types. 接下來，如有必要，修正方法被呼叫以填入陣列中的物件。Next, as necessary, a fix-up method is called to fill in the objects in the array. 此外，在初始化期間，.NET Framework XML 序列化基礎結構以動態方式產生並編譯暫存類別以進行還原序列化衍生自。In addition, during initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization that derives from . 在此過程中，基礎結構會產生方法和SOAP 編碼、 多重參考 XML 資料的物件。During this process, the infrastructure generates methods and objects for SOAP-encoded, multi-referenced XML data. 方法接著會在還原序列化期間叫用。The methods are then invoked during deserialization. 您不應該直接建立的執行個體或類別。You should not directly create instances of the or classes.

SOAP 編碼允許唯一的 XML 項目出現一次為 SOAP 訊息內`multiRef`所識別的項目`id`屬性。SOAP encoding allows a unique XML element to appear once within a SOAP message as a `multiRef` element identified by an `id` attribute. `id`值可以由參考多次`ref`屬性 (或`href`SOAP 1.1 中的屬性) 的替代項目。The `id` value can be referenced multiple times by `ref` attributes (or `href` attributes in SOAP 1.1) in substitute elements. SOAP 編碼為 SOAP 1.1 規格的第 5 節中所述。SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 受保護的成員供只會在內部使用.NET Framework XML 序列化基礎結構內的衍生類別所使用。The protected members of are intended for use only by derived classes that are used internally within the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure. SOAP 編碼方式，指定在第 5 節 SOAP 1.1 規格中，以允許多次參考 SOAP 訊息中的項目 (或選擇性，只有一次) 到所參考`href`主要訊息中的屬性。SOAP encoding, as specified in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification, allows for elements referenced multiple times in a SOAP message (or optionally, just once) to be referred by an `href` attribute in the main message. 事件發生於這類項目隨即出現，但是沒有任何`href`的參考。An event occurs when such an element appears, but there is no `href` reference to it. 將處理常式方法加入以提供自訂的未參考的物件，而處理執行其方法。Add a handler method to to provide custom handling for unreferenced objects while the executes its method.
